lead_paragraph: Sumner Redstone said in an emailed letter that he longer trusts Viacom’s chief, Philippe Dauman, or the company’s board.

headline.main: Redstone Says in a Letter He No Longer Trusts Viacom’s Chief

snippet: Sumner Redstone said in an emailed letter that he longer trusts Viacom’s chief, Philippe Dauman, or the company’s board.
abstract: Media mogul Sumner M Redstone states in letter to Viacom's lead independent director Frederic V Salerno that he no longer trusts company's chief executive Philippe P Dauman and his supporters; does not address open letter sent by Salerno, who has alleged that Redstone's views are being distorted by interlopers and who has attempted to meet with him face-to-face.
